dkan_dataset\/1f2042ad-c513-4fcf-a933-ca.description:
Statistics on U.S. smoking rates and tobacco taxation rates for all fifty states.

Source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, 2015
https://www.cdc.gov/tobacco/data_statistics/state_data/

Related Data Story: State-Level Policies Reduce Smoking Rates Nationwide

distribution.description: Source: The Campaign for Tobacco-Free Kids, April 2016: https://www.tobaccofreekids.org/research/factsheets/pdf/0097.pdf
distribution.title: Tobacco Taxation by State as of April 2016

distribution.description: Source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, 2015
distribution.title: U.S. Adult Smoking Rate

dkan_dataset\/1f2042ad-c513-4fcf-a933-ca.title: U.S. Tobacco Usage Statistics

dkan_dataset\/e1f2ebcd-ee23-454f-87b5-df.description:
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention data regarding varicella (chickenpox) virus incidence and mortality rates.

Source: https://data.cdc.gov/NNDSS/NNDSS-Table-II-Varicella-to-West-Nile-virus-d...

Related Data Story: An End to Chickenpox: The Varicella Vaccine's Success Story

distribution.description: Source: "Near elimination of varicella deaths in the US after implementation of the vaccination program." published in the American Journal of Pediatrics in August 2011.
distribution.title: Varicella Mortality by Age Group, 1995-2009

distribution.description: Source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention in Atlanta, Georgia. “Varicella Mortality: Trends before Vaccine Licensure in the United States, 1970–1994” published August 2000 in the Journal of Infectious Diseases.
distribution.title: Varicella Mortality by Age Group, 1970-1994

distribution.description: Source: "Impact of Vaccination on the Epidemiology of Varicella: 1995–2009" published in the journal Pediatrics in August 2011.
distribution.title: Varicella Incidence Rates After Vaccine Introduced in U.S., 1995-2009

dkan_dataset\/e1f2ebcd-ee23-454f-87b5-df.title: Varicella (Chickenpox) Incidence and Mortality, Before and After the Vaccine
